description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Tanglin, Singapore. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Top-Rated Singapore Escape near Orchard Road with Two Onsite Restaurants & Bar
hotels.description: Discover Singapore's vibrant fusion of cultures, iconic sightseeing and unforgettable cuisine in signature luxury at JEN Singapore Tanglin by Shangri-La, a playful property ranked in the top 10% of hotels worldwide by Tripadvisor. Singapore is renowned for its cuisine, from street food hawker fare in Chinatown to Michelin-starred fine dining. Here, you can enjoy an authentic, mouthwatering feast without leaving your hotel. J65 serves up hot, home-style dishes alongside fresh seafood, Ah Hoi's Kitchen is all about authentic Singaporean cuisine and Rumpoles Bar is your go-to for a Singapore-inspired craft cocktail in an exclusive club-like setting. When you're not wining and dining, make use of the hotel's 24-hour gym or take a dip in the outdoor swimming pool and whirlpool. When youâ€™re ready to explore the wonders Singapore has to offer, Orchard Road's retail heaven is just a short walk away, while the open-air food street of Chinatown, where you'll find your next great feed, is a 10-minute drive. Slightly further are the jaw-dropping garden displays of the iconic Gardens by the Bay and Marina Bay Sands.

seo.title: Hotel a Tanglin - Singapore Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Tanglin, Singapore con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
